opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Allen & Co., Inc. v. Pacific Dunlop Holdings Inc

opinion:
510 U.S. 1083

Allen & Co., Inc.
v.
Pacific Dunlop Holdings Inc.

No. 93-201.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 21, 1994.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 7th Cir.

2

Certiorari granted. Brief of petitioner is to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Friday, March 4, 1994. Brief of respondent is to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Friday, April 1, 1994. A reply brief, if any, is to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Friday, April 15, 1994. This Court's Rule 29 does not apply. Reported below: 993 F. 2d 578.
